Action.author: denyeart
Action.body: ~tkueda I moved the issue from Fabric (FAB) to Cello (CE) project.

Action.author: denyeart
Action.body: ~tkueda ok, I didn't know this was in fabric-test. I've moved back to FAB with component fabric-quality. From the change history it looks like ~suryalnvs is the developer. Please collaborate, you can reach him at rocket chat suryalanka.

Action.author: scottz
Action.body: ~tkueda I am reviewing some issues in our backlog. I have not seen a patch submitted to fix this. Did I miss it? Let us know if this can be closed/abandoned, or if a patch is forthcoming, or if you desire assistance.

Action.author: scottz
Action.body: ATD is being deprecated and removed in latest release.
